revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Burned Tower |image = [[File:Burned Tower.png|thumb]] |caption = An outside view of Burned Tower. |tokens = 4,500 |location = Northwest of Ecruteak City. }} '''Burned Tower''' is a [[dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Johto]]. It initially has 36 tiles arranged in a 6x6 square, including 6 chest tiles, 15 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 88,500 HP.
== Encounter Tables ==
===Wild Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Rattata.png|40px]] Rattata || colspan=2 rowspan=4|<center>N/A |- | [[File:Raticate.png|40px]] Raticate |- | [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat |- | [[File:Koffing.png|40px]] Koffing |}
===Boss Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | [[File:Golbat.png|40px]] Golbat || <center>360,000 || colspan=3 rowspan=3|<center>N/A |- | [[File:Weezing.png|40px]] Weezing || <center>320,000 |- | [[File:Shuckle.png|40px]] Shuckle || <center>610,000 |- |}
==Items==
<tabs> <tab name="Base"> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 250 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|Dowsing Machine}} || 2 || 52.08% || 50.75% || 48.67% || 44.97% |- | {{Bag2|xAttack}} || 1 || 26.04% || 25.38% || 24.33% || 22.49% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Red Shard}} || 1 || 20.85% || 22.19% || 24.31% || 28.05% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Legendary''' |- | {{Bag2|Revive}} || 1 || 0.26% || 0.42% || 0.67% || 1.12% |- | {{Bag2|Flame Plate}} || 1 || 0.26% || 0.42% || 0.67% || 1.12% |- | {{Bag2|Ultra Ball}} || 1 || 0.26% || 0.42% || 0.67% || 1.12% |- | {{Bag2|Charcoal}} || 1 || 0.26% || 0.42% || 0.67% || 1.12% |} </tab>
<tab name="Debuff"> After reaching [[Unova]], the drop chance for items will be [[Dungeons#Dungeon Loot Regional Debuff|debuffed]].
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !!
